goals__remit:
Full company profile at: 
https://www.unicreditbulbank.bg/en/about-us/ 
 
We, in UniCredit Bulbank, provide solutions for all challenges and opportunities our clients face in their everyday activities. We strive to be a partner, easy to work with, to create real value for our customers and contractors. 
 
As part of the leading European bank group UniCredit we invest in innovations and in talented experts, who make banking faster, easily accessible and convenient – anytime, anywhere.
